entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
